name: testing-mock-event-emitters
description: this is some simple code to play around with mocking event emitters for testing

scripts.test: istanbul cover ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha test/test.js --report lcovonly -- -R spec && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js && rm -rf ./coverage

author: hortinstein
